title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion euros, with a total of 12 data points.
Overall Revenue in billion euros has increased over the Year.

Revenue in billion euros is roughly constant from 2006/07 to 2009/10, slightly increasing from 2009/10 to 2011/12, roughly constant from 2011/12 to 2013/14, and lastly gradually increasing from 2013/14 to 2017/18.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2013/14 and 2014/15.
Max Revenue in billion euros about 4.1 was recorded at Year 2017/18
Min Revenue in billion euros about 2.74 was recorded at Year 2006/07
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion euros, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2008/09 to 2017/18.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2006/07 to 2008/09.
